data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during ALDERNEY cruise from Teneriffe to Nagapatan started at 1761-05-30

Ship: Alderney (Sloop), Voyage: Teneriffe - Nagapatan, 1st Observer: John Peighin (Captain), 2nd Observer: Charles Emery (2nd Officer/Lieutenant), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 10G 430BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
